string.text: Anti-radiation drugs

Mexaminum radiation protection drugs are common in the Zone. When used, this drug induces contraction of peripheral blood vessels and oxygen deprivation, which serves to treat and prevent radiation exposure. The drug does not have severe side effects, although isolated cases of mild nausea, dizziness, cramps and stomach pain have been reported.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] severly unhealthy
Bandage

A normal elastic bandage used to stop bleeding and prevent infection of wounds. For regular bleeding, carefully apply the bandage to the wound. For arterial bleeding, urgently tie the bandage around the affected area.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medical item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (adhesive plaster)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] max. bleed. stop: %c[0,140,140,140]120 ml / min
Standard Ukrainian issue military binoculars with a maximum of x7.5 magnification. Useful in the Zone in that they allow its owner to observe things from a distance.
Military Binoculars
Bread Loaf

A fine bread loaf baked by Nimble's wife who lives outside the Zone, this was the first item Nimble started to sell in the Zone. Now days he provide the Bar keepers with this fine bread instead of selling it him self as in the past, after all he has bigger things on his mind now.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
Bread Loaf leftover
A bread loaf baked outside the Zone.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
Porn magazine

100 pages of prime russian girls. A popular way of mentally getting away from The Zone for a moment. The western men in the Zone joke about this Russian porn magazine saying "From Russia with love".\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
Cannabis joint (zone produced)

A joint calms and relaxes your mind in a very pleasant way with a soothing effect if you have alcohol in your blood. It also makes you hungry very fast. Joints are valuable in The Zone.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild alcohol sobering effect
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness increase
Pack of Marlboro cigarettes (imported)

Pack of imported, western cigarettes with only few left. Smoking tobacco calms your nerves when you need to settle your mental state and fight your hunger in an alternative way. They are rare in The Zone and quite valuable.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild alcohol sobering effect
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild sleepiness decrease
Ukranian Special Forces Survival Guide

You have studied this survival guide many times and believe that the only use now is some quick cash as stalkers might want to have this book when exploring this area.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
Chocolate protein bar (imported)

Protein bars of this type are healthy and good meals when your body is in a constant active state. You can keep them for many days before they loose their chewy consistency.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high quality
Axyltallisal "The Rebirth"

Warning! Do not use in combination with ANY other drug. This powerful mixture packed in a small syringe knocks you down. But when you wake up (IF you wake up) you will feel reborn. Inject the syringe into your thigh when sitting down.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] causes temporary blackout
Can of tuna fish (imported)
The date on the tin can indicates that you should expect the tuna fish inside to be rather unappetizing.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
Rat skewers

2 small skewers of flame grilled Tushkano meat flavored with salt and chili pepper. This is the cheapest hot meal that is cooked in the The Zone. Served in a slice of thick brown paper.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +61 mSv
Dog chops

A small but hot meal of cooked dog chops blended with garlic, peppers and mushrooms. Served in an old tin box. A cheap alternative to the more popular boar beef.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +202 mSv
Pseudodog meat

Portion of cooked psuedodog meat chops. Good nutrition value due to dense muscle mass of the animal.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +265 mSv
Fat bacon

2 slices of fat and greasy bacon made from mutated pigs commonly known as Flesh. Served in a slice of thick brown paper.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +570 mSv
Boar beef

A small flame grilled beef with added salt and peppers. The most popular meal among stalkers. Served in brown paper.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +595 mSv
Bloodsucker Goulash

A small but hot meal made from Bloodsucker flesh spiced with chilies and added mushrooms. Served in a tin box.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +530 mSv
Roasted Snork hand.

Grilled snork hand. Somehow feels even more grouse than fresh one.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +332 mSv
The Masculine Meal

A portion of Chimera beef cooked with mushrooms and spices. An expensive meal that is eaten by veteran stalkers only to celebrate succes and survival in The Zone.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] unhealthy food
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] radiation poisoning: %c[0,170,170,170] +660 mSv
Echo detector

This dated anomalous activity detector produces an alarm signal when anomalous particles enter a special chamber as you approach an anomaly. It can also register the presence of artifacts and measure the distance to the nearest one. The distance is indicated by the frequency of the sound the detector emits. To switch to artifact search mode, open the device's front cover. Due to its simple design, Echo can only be used to locate the most common artifacts.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD
Detector "Bear"
Veles detector

A next generation scientific detection scanner. Thanks to three modernized detection chambers, the position of artifacts is shown on a special display screen. When closed, the device registers only radiation and anomalies. To switch to artifact search mode, open the front LED display. When in search mode, the detector is capable of locating all artifacts known to science.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD
Svarog detector prototype

A prototype of an expanded functionality anomalous frequency scanner. This device comes with a program used to identify static areas of anomalous activity stored in its database, while retaining the ability to locate artifacts. The position of anomalous areas and artifacts is displayed on a special screen. The artifact search mode, which can be activated by opening the front LED display, has been modified to detect anomalous formations currently unknown to science.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD

A standard head-mounted flashlight in fully working order. Useful for stalkers who find themselves out and about after dark, but may attract trouble if used unwisely.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate UPD consumption
Head lamp
Anabiotics
Antidote

The IP2 antitoxin is a complex drug comprising several antidotes, including metoclopramidum, pyridoxine, thiamine, riboxin and other pharmaceuticals. The drug is used to inject a range of antibiotics to neutralize natural poisons, together with synthetic poison absorbers, into the bloodstream. IP2 is not particularly popular in the Zone, as most stalkers rely on a gas mask and a protective suit, there are still those who have a pack of this antidote stashed away. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] causes dizzyness
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness increase
Hercules
Vinca

Ukrainian Vikasolum - an artificial equivalent of vitamin K. The main purpose of this drug is to increase blood coagulation speed. In great demand among stalkers who want slow-healing wounds and lacerations inflicted by mutants to close up faster. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] causes dizzyness
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness increase
Psy-block

A drug that blocks avalanche-like nerve impulses. Consumption induces short-term loss of all emotion. Used exclusively in the Zone to counteract the effects of anomalous psy-fields. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] causes extreme dizzyness
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] large sleepiness increase
Radioprotectant
Sparkling Water (imported)

Sparkling water for the thirsty Stalker, it has some exhilarated effect when you are tired.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild alcohol sobering effect
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight sleepiness decrease
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
Strong energy drink

Often used by stalkers on long trips, due to it's exhilarated effect when you are getting tired. The drink have also some "sobering up" effect if you have looked to deep in to the Vodka bottle as well it stimulate the release of adrenaline into the bloodstream. Do not overdose.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] potent alcohol sobering effect
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] large sleepiness decrease
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
A trusty guitar.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
Guitar
Pack of old meat

A package containing a mixture of old bread and some smelly pork meat wrapped in brown paper. The look and smell of this signals that some of it is rotten.\n \n%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] dirty food
First-aid kit

A general purpose single-use medical kit. Handy for treating injuries, wounds, chemical and thermal burns and various types of poisoning.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slow usage (field kit)
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] prolonged body recovery time
Army medkit

A specialized medical kit for providing first aid to combat casualties. The kit includes blood coagulants based on menadione, painkillers, antibiotics and immunostimulants, as well as a kit for removing bullets and fragments from the body. This medkit is issued primarily to army personnel such as Spetsnaz units embedded deep within the Zone and is popular among Duty forces.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slow usage (field kit)
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] prolonged body recovery time
Scientific medkit

A medical kit designed specifically for use in the Zone. The kit contains products for handling wounds, as well as preventing the development of radiation poisoning: and reducing accumulated radiation in the body. Contains Vikasolum, Batilolum and Naphazoline, unlike other medkits.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high quality
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slow usage (field kit)
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] prolonged body recovery time
Improvised stimpack (zone produced)

Improvised stimpacks are popular among novice Zone Men as they are easily attainable and withing reach in therms of costs. They are produced from commonly available contents, locally in the Zone often without proper composition and purification of the mixture. This leads to many side effects when they are infected intramusculary into the thigh. These include headache, paraesthesia and considerable increase in nutrition demand.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate body recovery time
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness increase
Military stimpack

Military stims are part of a standard issue soldier equipment for field operation within the Zone. Easily attainable on the market, they are not too cheap and are popular among experienced Stalkers. They are siginificantly more potent and faster working than their improvised conterparts, allowing for much more rapid and often life-saving stabilization. Army specifications did not take into consideration user's pleasure though, thus extremely high density and raw nature of healing agents often cause shock, extreme dizziness and extensive hunger episodes.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast body recovery time
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] large sleepiness increase
Scientific stimpack

Created by chemical department of the same Kiev defence research institute wich developed SEVA, this state-of-art mixture constitutes the highest level of rapidly-working health stabilizers available in the Zone. Best quality ingredients and perfected formula allow for almost instant health restorative effect and high rate radiation cleansing. Side effects are minimized. Extremely high cost practically limits regular users of this grade of medicaments to a small group of the most skillfull and succesfull Zone explorers.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] high quality
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] rapid body recovery time
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slight sleepiness increase

A package of small white sleeping pills that will imediately slow and ease your stressed mind. Eat or drink 5 min before you want to rest and use water in combination for maximum effect.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] immed. sleepiness induction

PDA with information about the Zone, digital logs and detailed maps over the Zone and it's anomaly's. Trading value could be high for this if you find the right person.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] low UPD consumption
PDA
A shot of Vodka (imported)

Cossacks Vodka imported to the zone. Goes down easy and considerably lowers the effects of radiation. Should be enjoyed in moderation. The bottles are used to shots of vodka and a often either refilled or emptied completely at stalker camps.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] stimulant
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] strong alcohol
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness increase

This last generation anomalous activity detector can be used to locate anomalous formations and has a color diode panel, which not only indicates the direction of artifacts, but also measures the distance to them. To switch to artifact search mode, open the device's front cover. Unfortunately, the device is programmed with a somewhat outdated list of detectable artifacts.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] does not require UPD

An experimental drug developed by Professor Ozersky for scientific research teams working in the Zone. At its core, the drug contains tetrodotoxin, known colloquially as "zombie powder," which causes a complete shutdown of the body's central nervous system that may allow people to survive emissions outside cover. The drug has not undergone clinical or field testing, which puts its effectiveness in doubt and raises the issue of possible side effects.%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine\n%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] causes temporary blackout\n
Bolt

The main component of this product is an anabolic androgen, an artificial steroid, the chemical composition of which resembles testosterone. Often used by stalkers during long raids to reduce muscle fatigue. Significantly increases weight-carrying capacity. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild alcohol sobering effect
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] large sleepiness increase

B190 Indraline radioprotectant, included in medkits issued to nuclear power plant personnel. Used in the Zone instead of the excessively toxic PC1 cystamine hydrochloride, repeated use of which often caused death. Reduces the effects of gamma radiation on live tissue. Best consumed before exposure, as effects are not instant. The effects of the drug are long-lasting.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] large sleepiness increase
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild dizziness
Harmonica
For blues and prison romance lovers.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
Battery pack

A pack of medium charged batteries that are already half drained for the use of your flashlight, PDA, nightvision goggles and other electronic devices. Remember to change regularly.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] technological item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] UPD charge +66%
Beards tea

Beards popular hot tea made from a mixture of sugar, harmless dried mushrooms and boiled water that is said to be cleansed from radiation. Stalkers who are able to pay the price are buying this drink for long trips in The Zone. It's a good and healthy way to stay alert when you are getting tired or exploring during cold nights.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] potent alcohol sobering effect
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate sleepiness increase
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
Fixing kit

This kit contains oils, mechanical tools used for basic maintaining and some small weapon spare parts. All metal items required to fix a broken weapon or suit to a functioning condition if you know your way around weapon mechanics. It's a heavy kit but it can be very helpful when exploring deep into The Zone with basic equipment. 1 use = +35% condition (but anything above 85% requires a real mechanic / workshop).

This is your personal ID card which reveals your true identity (keep it hidden). As a USS Assaulter you are specialized in assault rifles, shotguns and heavy weapons. You are also specialized in the control of weapon recoil. Slow sprinting speed.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] personal belongings
100-rouble coins

Trade in The Zone is mainly done through electronic transactions for safety and managing reasons. But many stalkers keep at least a few coins on them to be able to buy smaller things like cigarettes off each other. This minimizes economy management and conserves battery life.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] physical currency unit
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] univerally recognized value
Clear Sky faction patch

Faction patches are often used to determine the rank of faction members as a high count is a strong symbol of great survival skills within The Zone. They are proof that you are ready to take a life in achieving your goals. For this reason it can be extremely dangerous to display a patch to the wrong people but they might as well open important doors for you.

%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] valuable item

Cleansed zone water

Military flasks are used for small sips of water. Medics and scientist are boiling portions of zone water with a special type of alcohol at very high temperatures. After that it is cooled down for a refreshing spark. This process results in a limited supply offered to each stalker at a price. The water is a little more expensive at medics since they pay for using other peoples primitive or improvised power supplies. The end result is clean refreshing water that has no remnants of radiation at all. Just what the doctor ordered when you are gaging of thirst. Some distrustful Stalkers throw in a disinfecting Akvatab into the flask to ease their paranoia of this once radioactive Zone water.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
Akvatabs

Small plastic bag with tablets for the use of zone water from wells, rivers and lakes all over The excluded Zone. Akvatabs tablets are intended for disinfecting water containing harmful bacteria and viruses.
 
%c[0,204,0,51] • %c[0,140,140,140] slow usage (dispersible tablets)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] clean nutrition source
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] mild sleepiness decrease
Metal shovel

An old metal shovel used for various field purposes. Few people actually keep shovels with them as they are a common found in The Zone. Especially around industrial areas.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item
Military field shovel

Black military shovel of high quality used for numorous field purposes. In the combat training of Spetsnaz soldiers, great attention is paid in their ability to engage in hand-to-hand combat and to use hand-held weapons. One famous example is the entrenching shovel. Mein Kampf

Heil Hitler! Adolf Hitlers strategic memoires gathered in a single book. The book and all that it stands for is hated by many making this an item of high symbolic value. Adolf Hitler (20 April 1889 – 30 April 1945) was an Austrian-born German politician and the leader of the National Socialist German Workers Party (German: Nationalsozialistische Deutsche Arbeiterpartei (NSDAP), commonly referred to as the Nazi Party). He was chancellor of Germany from 1933 to 1945 and dictator of Nazi Germany (as Führer und Reichskanzler) from 1934 to 1945. Hitler was at the centre of the founding of Nazism, the start of World War II, and the Holocaust.

Dead Geiger Counter

Dead geiger counter that may have served its purpose. A Geiger counter is a type of particle detector that measures ionizing radiation. They detect the emission of nuclear radiation: alpha particles, beta particles or gamma rays. A Geiger counter detects radiation by ionization produced in a low-pressure gas in a tube. Invented in 1908, Geiger counters remain popular instruments used for measurements in health, physics, industry, geology and other fields, because they can be made with simple electronic circuits.

This notebook describes various drug deals in detail. Specific nick names, locations and time of meeting. Some deals are executed through equipment exchanges and some deals are payed in large amounts of rubles. When running through the pages it becomes clear that Freedom faction are the main distributors of natural drugs like marihuana and plant substances. Bandits are producers and distributors of the more powerful (and dangerous) synthetic drugs like salicidic acid and cocaine. Apparently these drugs are being traded with every faction to some extent. Especially Monolith faction seems to be taking in large amounts drugs in exhange for the more expensive types of ammunition and equipment.

Quick Release System

In The Zone you are most likely to be caught by surprise in terrible situations. With a QR-system you can unburden yourself in a matter of seconds and grant yourself the freedom of movement with low weight. The system is for your backpack. Place it as a hotkey item. Push the hotkey to activate the emergency release that instantly drops your backpack (and everything inside it) to free yourself from its weight. Your equipped weapon(s), ammunition, armour and armour attachments remain equipped so you are ready for fighting. Retrieve your backpack afterwards.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item

Cocaine (zone produced)

Small aluminium case containing cocaine and the tools for its use. Cocaine is a powerful nervous system stimulant. Its effects can last from 15–30 minutes to an hour, depending on the route of administration. Cocaine increases alertness, feelings of well-being and euphoria, energy and motor activity, feelings of competence and sexuality. Athletic performance may be enhanced in sports where sustained attention and endurance is required. Anxiety, paranoia and restlessness are also frequent. With excessive dosage, tremors, convulsions and increased body temperature are observed. Occasional cocaine use does not typically lead to severe or even minor physical or social problems. Bandits are know for making use of such drugs right before launching an assault or ambush.

Tetanus vaccine

Tetanus vaccine is composed of inactivated tetanus toxin and is used to prevent an individual from contracting tetanus. Tetanus, also known as lockjaw, is a disease caused by the bacteria Clostridium tetani which enters the body through open wounds and releases a poison called tetanospasmin. This is a potentially deadly disease because the poison attacks the nervous system blocking nerve signals from the spinal cord to and from the muscles. Animals of the Zone have a high likehood of carrying the Teranus disease and it spreads easily through bites. As injection of inactivated toxin overally boosts users organism activity, there are several positive side-effects of usage can be experienced. Morever in this particular case the mixture has been enhanced by several additional anti-toxins making the vaccine usable beyond its original purpose.

Camouflaged tarpaulin

A tarpauling (or hootch) is a large sheet of strong, flexible, water-resistant or waterproof material, often cloth such as canvas or polyester coated with urethane. Or made of plastics such as polyethylene. They often have reinforced grommets at the corners and along the sides to form attachment points for rope, allowing them to tied down or suspended between trees. A good tool for several purposes. It is mainly used for creating small and simple tent like hideouts for resting. Trading value is low as alternatives are found many places in industrial areas.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] military item

Epinephrine shot

Epinephrine (also known as adrenalin) is a hormone and a neurotransmitter. Epinephrine has many functions in the body, instantly regulating heart rate, blood vessel and air passage diameters, and metabolic shifts. Epinephrine release is a crucial component of the fight-or-flight response of the sympathetic nervous system. The effects lead to increased blood glucose and fatty acids, providing substrates for instant energy production within cells throughout the body.

Hexamine field cooker

A lightweight, strong and compact solid fuel stove supplied with two small Hexene fuel tabs. Hexi solid fuel tablets burn without odour and ignite easily with a match - 4 small fuel tablets will bring to the boil 2.5 cups of water in approximately 5 minutes. On opening the cooker, it can be used in several ways. The hinged openers can be angled to concentrate the heat to a pinpointed area, for direct heat, or, used at 90 deg angle for regular cooking, or the cooker can be inverted, (Spikes down) placing the fuel blocks closer to the mess tin. Whichever way you use it, the Hexi Cooker is a reliable field cooker that will never let you down. It will work in all weathers, and heat water and food quickly.\n \n%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] everyday item

Morphine ampoule (imported)

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personel for instant pain reduction. This ampoule contains a powerful dosis of Morphine. In clinical medicine, morphine is regarded as the gold standard, or benchmark, of opioid analgesics used to relieve severe or agonizing pain and suffering. Like other opioids, such as oxycodone, hydromorphone, and diacetylmorphine (heroin), morphine acts directly on the central nervous system (CNS) to relieve pain. Injected to arm or thigh.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] medicine
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] fast usage (syringe)
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] significant damage resistance bonus
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] moderate health restoration on usage
Salicidic Acid ampoule (zone produced)

An iron ampoule designed as field equipment for military field personel for instant pain reduction. This ampoule contains a powerful dosis of Salicylic acid. Salicylic acid is known for its ability to ease aches and pains and reduce fevers. These medicinal properties, particularly fever relief, have been known since ancient times, and it is used as an anti-inflammatory drug.Some researchers believe that salicylate is an essential micronutrient in the human diet, potentially qualifying as a vitamin, namely Vitamin S. Injected to arm or thigh.
